thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Balchem Corp Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.68

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Balchem Corp Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.68
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Balchem Corp:
* REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER SALES OF $159.3 MILLION WITH RECORD NET EARNINGS OF $42.0 MILLION, RECORD ADJUSTED NET EARNINGS OF $21.9 MILLION AND RECORD ADJUSTED EBITDA OF $40.0 MILLION
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.68 * Q4 SALES ROSE 13.2 PERCENT TO $159.3 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.30 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.62, REVENUE VIEW $150.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
